Hello LET!  

My name is Hassan and I'm here from ReverseHosts.com to offer you some special discounts on our OpenVZ VPS lines, including our newly introduced SSD OpenVZ VPS line. These VPSs will be hosted with Calihop in San Diego, CA. We have been around since September of 2012 and are always working on improving our services. Right now we only provide OpenVZ VPS and we utilize the SolusVM control panel.

Please note rDNS can be set via ticket only.
  
SSD nodes are protected by hardware RAID10, and our non-SSD OpenVZ nodes are protected by software RAID10.  All nodes in San Diego run on at least E3-1270v2s and 32GB RAM. 

CPU/Disk-Intensive applications such as *coin mining are not allowed on our servers. IRC and VPNs are allowed. 

If you have any questions please use our pre-sales contact form located [here](https://clients.reversehosts.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=7).
